variables.name: Intro
variables.value: Welcome to BIOC100A. Quantum mechanics can be painful...

variables.name: Laser
variables.value: Don't get caught in my X-RAY BEAM!

variables.name: Quiz
variables.value: Pop quiz! Who was more responsible for the discovery of the structure of DNA?

variables.name: QuizDone
variables.value: Crystallographers rarely get the credit they deserve.

variables.name: NothingQ
variables.value: What happens when you apply the annihilation operator to the ground state?
